Your teachings espouse that none should live in bondage or under the iron law of another realm, organisation or person.

Teaching Skill Society

Teaching Reaction @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.HZmZfVyhS9AaYFZj]{Supplication}

Empowered Reaction (12th Feat) You punish those who ensnare your allies. If the triggering enemy was using any effects to make your ally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} when you used Liberating Step, that enemy takes persistent spirit damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Supreme Reaction (14th Feat) In addition to the ally affected by Liberating Step, you and all other allies in your champion's aura can Step as a free action. You and your allies gain the benefit even if the ally who benefited from Liberating Step can't move.
